name: Devastation: Resistance Breeds Revolution
description: The earth has been destroyed and power has been taken over by large corrupt corporations. Their police force, the Pacification Squads, maintain order. The only hope for freedom is a small group of resistance fighters. As their leader, you must assemble your army, travel the globe and bring peace back to a dangerous world. 32 levels, 22 single player and 14 multiplayer maps in four breathtaking environments.
